title: Sensitivity and specificity of Nanopore sequencing for detecting carbapenem and 3rd-generation cephalosporin-resistant Enterobacteriaceae in urine samples: Real-time simulation with public antimicrobial resistance gene database
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Kornthara Kawang, Pannaporn Thongsuk, Pornsawan Cholsaktrakool, Songtham Anuntakarun, Pattapon Kunadirek, Natthaya Chuaypen, Sumanee Nilgate, Tanittha Chatsuwan, Intawat Nookaew, Nicha Sangpiromapichai, Voraphoj Nilaratanakul
